p: Well trained local health professionals were responsible for questionnaire interview and screening test. All participants were informed of the objectives, contents, potential risk and benefits of this survey prior to the data collection. Study participants were assigned a unique identifier number to collect data confidentially. Face-to-face interviews were conducted and a structured questionnaire (see Additional file 1) covered sociodemographic characteristics (including age, sex, ethnicity, marital status, education, occupation, and household annual income), risky sexual behaviors (frequency of condom use and having multiple sexual partners), drug abuse and history of blood transfusion.
